Class ServerSide.Application

java.lang.Object
ServerSide.Application
Enclosing class:
ServerSide
public static class ServerSide.Application extends Object
Singleton Static class that holds all the objects that need to be accessible from everywhere. This class ensures that there is only one instance of each component within the application.
